title: The new pollecye of warre wherin is declared not only how [ye]mooste cruell tyraunt the great Turke may be ouer come, but also all other enemies of the Christen publique weale, lately deuised by Theodore Basille.
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publisher: In Botulphe lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Iohn̄ Maylerre for Iohn̄ Gough,
notes: Running title reads: The pollecy of warre.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
